span.span: The type of objects to compare.

summary.span: 为 泛型接口的实现提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for implementations of the generic interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从此类派生，以提供 接口的自定义实现，以便与 和 泛型类等集合类一起使用。Derive from this class to provide a custom implementation of the interface for use with collection classes such as the and generic classes. 派生自 类和实现 接口之间的差异如下：The difference between deriving from the class and implementing the interface is as follows: - 若要指定默认情况下应如何比较两个对象，请在类中实现 接口。To specify how two objects should be compared by default, implement the interface in your class. 这可确保排序操作将使用您提供的默认比较代码。This ensures that sort operations will use the default comparison code that you provided. - 若要定义要使用的比较器而不是默认比较器，请从 类派生。To define a comparer to use instead of the default comparer, derive from the class. 然后，您可以在采用比较器作为参数的排序操作中使用此比较器。You can then use this comparer in sort operations that take a comparer as a parameter. 属性返回的对象使用 泛型接口（`IComparable(Of T)` 在C#Visual Basic 中为`IComparable`）来比较两个对象。The object returned by the property uses the generic interface (`IComparable` in C#, `IComparable(Of T)` in Visual Basic) to compare two objects. 如果类型 `T` 未实现 泛型接口， 属性返回使用 接口的 。If type `T` does not implement the generic interface, the property returns a that uses the interface. ## Examples 下面的示例从 类派生类 `BoxLengthFirst`。The following example derives a class, `BoxLengthFirst`, from the class. 此比较器比较 `Box`类型的两个对象。This comparer compares two objects of type `Box`. 首先按长度、按高度和宽度对它们进行排序。It sorts them first by length, then by height, and then by width. `Box` 类实现 接口，以控制两个 `Box` 对象之间的默认比较。The `Box` class implements the interface to control the default comparison between two `Box` objects. 此默认实现首先按高度进行排序，然后按长度和宽度进行排序。This default implementation sorts first by height, then by length, and then by width. 该示例首先通过使用 `BoxLengthFirst` 比较器并使用默认比较器对 `Box` 对象的列表进行排序，从而显示两个比较之间的差异。The example shows the differences between the two comparisons by sorting a list of `Box` objects first by using the `BoxLengthFirst` comparer and then by using the default comparer. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.BoxCompare#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxcompare/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.BoxCompare#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxcompare/vb/program.vb#1)]

para.span: 和 在区分区域性和区分大小写方面的行为可能有所不同。

span.span: and may behave differently in terms of culture-sensitivity and case-sensitivity.

para.span: 对于字符串比较，建议将 类<string>上的比较器。

span.span: For string comparisons, the class is recommended over Comparer<String>.

para.span: 类的属性返回预定义实例，这些实例可执行具有不同的区域性敏感性和区分大小写的组合的字符串比较。

span.span: Properties of the class return predefined instances that perform string comparisons with different combinations of culture-sensitivity and case-sensitivity.

para.span: 同一个 实例的成员之间的区分大小写和区分大小写。

span.span: The case-sensitivity and culture-sensitivity are consistent among the members of the same instance.

para.span: 有关区域性特定比较的详细信息，请参阅 命名空间以及[全球化和本地化](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/index.md)。

span.span: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/index.md).

span.span: The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，对同一类型的两个对象执行比较并返回一个值，指示一个对象是小于、等于还是大于另一个对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, performs a comparison of two objects of the same type and returns a value indicating whether one object is less than, equal to, or greater than the other.

returns.span: 一个有符号整数，指示 和 的相对值，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative values of and , as shown in the following table.
Value
Meaning
Less than zero
is less than .
Zero
equals .
Greater than zero
is greater than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此方法可以为类型 `T`提供自定义的排序顺序比较。Implement this method to provide a customized sort order comparison for type `T`. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了可用于代替默认比较器的 `Box` 对象的比较器。The following example defines a comparer of `Box` objects that can be used instead of the default comparer. 此示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.BoxCompare#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxcompare/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.BoxCompare#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxcompare/vb/program.vb#5)]

exception.span: 类型 没有实现 泛型接口或 接口。

span.span: Type does not implement either the generic interface or the interface.

para.span: 允许比较 与任何引用类型，并且不会生成异常。

span.span: Comparing with any reference type is allowed and does not generate an exception.

para.span: 空引用被视为小于任何非空引用。

span.span: A null reference is considered to be less than any reference that is not null.

para.span: 有关区域性特定的比较信息，请参阅 命名空间和[全球化和本地化](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/index.md)。

span.span: For information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/index.md).

summary.span: 返回由泛型参数指定的类型的默认排序顺序比较器。

span.span: Returns a default sort order comparer for the type specified by the generic argument.

value.span: 继承 并作为 类型的排序顺序比较器的对象。

span.span: An object that inherits and serves as a sort order comparer for type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的 使用 泛型接口（`IComparable(Of T)` 在C#Visual Basic 中为`IComparable`）来比较两个对象。The returned by this property uses the generic interface (`IComparable` in C#, `IComparable(Of T)` in Visual Basic) to compare two objects. 如果类型 `T` 未实现 泛型接口，则此属性返回使用 接口的 。If type `T` does not implement the generic interface, this property returns a that uses the interface. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性获取执行默认比较的对象。The following example shows how to use the property to get an object that performs the default comparison. 此示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.BoxCompare#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxcompare/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.BoxCompare#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxcompare/vb/program.vb#3)]

para.span: 对于字符串比较，建议使用 类，而不是<字符串> （字符串）在 Visual Basic 中的比较器。

span.span: For string comparisons, the class is recommended over Comparer<String> (Comparer(Of String) in Visual Basic).

para.span: 类的属性返回预定义实例，这些实例可执行具有不同的区域性敏感性和区分大小写的组合的字符串比较。

span.span: Properties of the class return predefined instances that perform string comparisons with different combinations of culture-sensitivity and case-sensitivity.

para.span: 同一个 实例的成员之间的区分大小写和区分大小写。

span.span: The case-sensitivity and culture-sensitivity are consistent among the members of the same instance.

para.span: 有关区域性特定比较的详细信息，请参阅 命名空间以及[全球化和本地化](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/index.md)。

summary.span: 比较两个对象并返回一个值，该值指示一个对象小于、等于还是大于另一个对象。

span.span: Compares two objects and returns a value indicating whether one is less than, equal to, or greater than the other.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是 方法的包装，因此 `obj` 必须强制转换为当前实例的泛型参数 `T` 指定的类型。This method is a wrapper for the method, so `obj` must be cast to the type specified by the generic argument `T` of the current instance. 如果无法将其强制转换为 `T`，则会引发 。If it cannot be cast to `T`, an is thrown. 允许比较 `null` 与任何引用类型，并且不会生成异常。Comparing `null` with any reference type is allowed and does not generate an exception. 进行排序时，`null` 被视为小于任何其他对象。When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法比较两个对象。The following example shows how to use the method to compare two objects. 此示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.BoxCompare#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxcompare/cs/program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.BoxCompare#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxcompare/vb/program.vb#4)]
